reviews.review:
Я очень люблю эту игру и именно по этой причине я хочу оставить ей негативный отзыв. Почему?

1) В последнее время игра словно заболела: лобби собираются крайне долго и постоянно вылетают. Если лобби собрано и игра началась - скорее всего, Вы либо не загрузитесь и потеряете своё подношение, либо загрузитесь втроём. Плюс ко всему, в последнее время стало популярным такое явление, как DC (Disconnect). Выжившие спокойно выходят из игры буквально в самые первые секунды по самым разным причинам и Вы, стоя с круглыми глазами, думаете, идти сдаваться и попробовать дочинить вдвоем-втроём пять генераторов. Блеск.

2) Новая система эмблем просто отвратительна. Мне действительно плевать на ранги, но то, что показали нам разработчики в последнем обновлении - ну это вообще какая-то необъяснимая жесть.

3) Хиты через доски и всё в таком роде. Здесь, пожалуй, объяснять не нужно - эта проблема существует, наверное, со времён динозавров :D

Разработчики, пожалуйста, прекратите заниматься ерундой и начните уже работать над стабильностью собственной игры. Многим, в том числе и мне, Dead by Daylight нравится и мы желаем ей только самого лучшего.

買った次の日にセール来てむかついたのでレビュー書きます
まず第一にマッチングが悪すぎる
キラー側は三分以上待たないとマッチングしない(生存者はマッチングする)
次に切断の多さ
生存者でマッチングしても味方がすぐ切断するせいでゲームにならない
本当にマッチングは改善して欲しい
切断もそうだけどゲームに参加できないのはマジで終わってる

別にゲーム自体は悪くないけどアプデが微妙
いまだに開発はテスト感覚で調整している印象

Dead by Daylight est un bon jeu où l'on ne s'ennuie pas. Le principe de survivre ou de tuer reste le même à chaque partie, cependant celle-ci varie en fonction des lieux, du type de survivants et de tueurs du coup c'est assez plaisant. 

Néanmoins, les joueurs de bas, moyen ou haut rangs ont actuellement difficile à trouver des parties en tueur. Le temps d'attente est long même si en soirée cela s'améliore un peu. Le temps d'attente en survivant est moins long et les parties 
s'enchaînent plutôt bien.

Malgré ce défaut, je recommande aux joueurs aimant ce genre de jeu d'essayer en raison de son côté non routinier.

Не исправили баги от прошлого патча, как запускают новые которые еще больше ломают все. Сообщают что исправили бесконечную загрузку, но внезапно это не исправлено. Имеют не работающие перки сурвов против определенных манов (напролом против легиона не срабатывает или тот же перк Эша на токены не работает против нюрсы. Исправите гавно в игре:исправим отзыв

[Updated at 537 hours of playtime]

There are 101 survivor perks, but I wouldn't blame you for only thinking there were 10.

Dead Hard --- Decisive Strike
Borrowed Time --- Iron Will
Unbreakable --- Boil Over --- Flip Flop
Circle of Healing --- Self-Care --- Adrenalin

All of these perks either:
A - Give the survivor a "get out of jail free" button
(Dead Hard, Decisive Strike, Adrenalin, Borrowed Time)

B - Are incredibly strong while playing SWF
(Unbreakable, Boil Over, Flip Flop, )

or C - Remove (or reduce) core aspects of the game
(Circle of Healing, Self-Care, Iron Will)

This meta is incredibly boring and the developers have continued to balance the game heavily towards survivors (especially SWF) in the last several years.

From the inability to consume items to the extreme amount of bullying killers experience from SWF groups.
The developers have basically confirmed that they want killers to tunnel or face-camp by making your "skill" tied to how many people you kill rather than how many hooks you get.

Killers have been given three options:
Play like an asshole with the best items and perks and get relatively easy wins.
Play "fairly", with mid tier items and perks, but sweat every match.
Lose.

Playing like an ass doesn't feel fun, sweating every match to *maybe* win sucks and constantly losing makes people uninstall. All I can say is that many killers don't want to play this game anymore, myself included.

as a relatively new player (on this account), this is my consentious

If you're new, you'll lose a lot. You'll make mistakes, and be mocked/punished for them. You'll work your way slowly toward having meta perks and a baseline of experience by which to enjoy the game more fully. The game has some bugs, but it's come a long way from what it used to be.

Survivors can lengthen chases by looping, a leftover from the old infinites and jungle gyms. As most players play mainly survivor, this is not frowned upon. I feel it is an unfun mechanic that takes away from the nature of the game. It is extremely effective and killers are ranked based on their ability to counter this mechanic.

Killers can secure easier victories by tunneling (generally coupled with a camp, soft camp, patrol, etc.). By prioritising the recently-unhooked and already injured survivor, the killer can remove players from the game with more ease, and increase the chance of killing at least 3 survivors and securing a pip or two. I feel it is an unfun mechanic that takes away from the nature of the game. As most players play mainly survivor, this is generally frowned upon.

There are counters of some extent to both of these advantages, but that's the gist of this game at the upper ranks. As I consider these tactics unfun, I will not participate in them myself, unless goaded into it. I assure you that there are other ways of playing the game, albeit potentially less effective.

//As of recent patch, "pipping", means by which you increase in rank, has become significantly more difficult as you move higher in the ranks. While perhaps a little overkill, it's a wonderful solution to the prior ease by which survivors would reach high ranks. I have high expectations that it can help shape the game's meta by rewarding and punishing certain behaviors.

//Additional note regarding queue times: queues will float between extremes where "perfect teams" are compiled with a long wait time, and "unbalanced teams" are comprised in a shorter wait time. There is no perfect answer for everyone. Sometimes you'll get into a lobby very quickly that has subpar balance, and other time's you'll queue for half an hour before reaching your first lobby. I expect the new ranking system will change things up as time goes on and adjustments are made.

DBD step by step quick guide

1- Launch DBD, have it dominate screen priority over literally anything else you're doing automatically.

2- Grab a tissue as your ears are already bleeding since the intro sound is not tied to any sound setting you have

3- Wait 5-20 minutes to find a rank 1 sweat bag lathering up in gamer sauce, noed, and Mori in the lobby

4- Stand still in game for 10-60 seconds as you muster the motivation to touch your peripherals

5- Run to a gen and instantly regret your decision to play as you hold m1 

6- Killer knows your exact location and/or gets instantly scrap-tech'd on to you (killer will swap targets to you don't worry about taunting them)

7- Loop them for 10-30 seconds and get hit through a window/pallet or get death touched by them spinning in a circle.

8- Watch helplessly as you hit stage 2 on your first hook since all 3 teammates didn't leave their gen and are as far away from the hook as possible since the killer is doing a loose patrol 5ft away.

9- Get unhooked in front to the killer with no borrowed time and get insta-downed since the killer will obviously go for the easy hit

10- This one is up to you, either alt+f4 expediting the inevitable or wait to be hooked again and die so you can spectate your team dying. With method 2 this gives you a chance to get to the post game lobby to see they are all console players so you waited to flame for nothing, and then alt+f4.

Seriously, steer clear of this dumpster fire.

good

I've played this game almost daily since purchasing it after Legion's release, but as much as I love it, I cannot recommend it. There are too many bugs, God-awful hitboxes, games where one or more people do not load in, connections to Turkish killers with 400 ping, lagswitchers, and imbalance due to killer mains crying their eyes out when survivors finally get a semi-decent perk that works every other blue moon with penalties to using it, all while riding their meta aura reading builds to victory.

EDIT: Everyone I know and I uninstalled the game after the horrendous Endgame Collapse update, which buffed killers even further after survivors do their job of evading capture. Shortly after this update, Mettle of Man was nerfed to garbage because of whiny killer mains. 
I can't believe how much the devs messed with this game and it hurts me to see it happen.
